interactivity.requirements: You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " A Trip to the Moon " from Chika Chosokabe

progression.synopsis: Sensei invites Chika to his house again while Ami is out. Chika is pleased not to have Ami watching her like a hawk this time, although she says that she can understand Ami being protective. She says that during her supposed detention , she wanted to "...you know, lick it and stuff". After a bit of discussion about who is the predator and who is the prey in this scenario, she does so.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.9p2.
